long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this base conversion calculator by selecting the input base from the 'From' dropdown and the desired output base from the 'To' dropdown. Enter your number in the input textarea, then click 'Convert'. The converted result will appear in the output textarea. Supports Binary, Decimal, Octal, and Hex.
